content.heroIntro:

This thoughtfully designed project showcases 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartments spanning 84m² of modern living space, with plots of 117m² offering privacy and comfort. Available from €375,000, MEDINA VILLAS represents outstanding value in one of Spain's most sought-after locations, with completion scheduled for June 1st, 2027.

Torrevieja has established itself as the premier destination for property buyers seeking the perfect blend of Mediterranean lifestyle, investment potential, and community. PROPERTY Y CONSULTING OFFICE brings decades of expertise in delivering quality homes that exceed expectations. MEDINA VILLAS stands as a testament to this commitment, offering contemporary finishes, practical layouts, and access to world-class amenities including Blue Flag beaches, international schools, and acclaimed golf courses.

Whether you're seeking a primary residence, investment property, or vacation retreat, MEDINA VILLAS provides the ideal foundation for your Spanish lifestyle. With property values increasing 8% year-on-year and rental yields of €650 per week, this development combines lifestyle appeal with solid financial fundamentals.

locationSection.intro: Pueblo is the vibrant heart of Torrevieja, where traditional Spanish charm meets modern Mediterranean living. This established neighborhood offers the perfect balance of authentic local culture and contemporary amenities, making it ideal for families, retirees, and professionals. The area is renowned for its excellent healthcare facilities, including the prestigious Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja offering 24-hour emergency services. Playa del Cura, a stunning Blue Flag beach with calm, crystal-clear waters, lies within easy reach, providing daily access to pristine coastline. Golf enthusiasts will appreciate the proximity to Villamartín Golf Course, just 15 minutes away, consistently ranked among Spain's finest courses. Pueblo attracts the largest expat community in Spain, with English widely spoken throughout, making it exceptionally welcoming for international buyers.
